name: Royal Derby Horse Racing
description:
Gallop your way to fame and fortune in Royal derby horse racing game! It's easy, exciting, fun, and highly addictive. Join the best horse championship race for perfect jump racing on different racing tracks.
ROYAL DERBY HORSE RACING CHALLENGE:
Choose your favorite stallion and race to the victory in the ultimate challenges against your competitors. Race through perilous tracks and skillfully play multiple levels in this highly challenging derby jump racing offered with different environments.
EXTREME RACING COMPETITION:
Exciting show jumping events are waiting for you! Practice with your horse to compete in a series of challenging competitions. Keeping your horse happy and healthy is the key to success! Will you be able to win this extreme derby horse racing competition?
2 EXCITING MODES:
Royal derby horse racing features two horse racing game modes that offer fun for the racer. Become No. 1 horse racer of this town by competing the opponent racers & winning this hurdle jump race from all other jockeys.
Endless racing mode:
The endless mode in Royal derby horse racing offers an amazing game play as your horse takes swift turns, jumps over all the obstacles, to make you experience the crazy horse riding in 3D. Control the right and left movements of the royal horse with easy swipe gestures and collect coins & other pick-ups on your way to enjoy endless fun!
Knockout racing mode:
Play knockout mode against all the opponent jockeys to enjoy the true essence of derby horse race in Knockout racing mode. Race your horse over different obstacles, choose the race track of your choice & complete different laps spread over different distances; Outrun the opponent jockeys to win the competition.
AMAZING HORSE RACING TRACKS:
You don't need to be a certain size or have any particular experience to become a champion jockey. Enjoy different colorful tracks in royal horse racing competition but don’t let your horse stumble upon the barriers.
EASY & INTUITIVE CONTROLS:
Royal Derby Horse Racing offers you the best controls with easy swipe gestures to help you change your lane as frequently as needed. You’ll be amazed by the high level responsiveness of the racing horses.
VIBRANT & AMAZING VISUALS:
The amazing colors of the game make it even more attractive. Whether it’s the beautiful green grass or off-road dirt track, the game play is as good as it gets! Royal derby horse racing competition promises to mesmerize you with its stunning graphics, and fascinate you with its captivating high quality visuals for an ultimate horse riding experience that will challenge you to your very core.
ROYAL HORSE DERBY RACING FEATURES:
• Realistic 3D Horse Racing Track
• Different horse racing tracks
• Exciting Races And Challenges
• 2 different game play modes
• Smooth Touch And swipe Control To Maneuver Your Horse Easily
• Maximum control flexibility in game play
• Awesome 3D Graphics And 3D Sound Effects
• Beautiful 3D Animated Horses
• FREE to download!
HOW TO PLAY:
• Select a stallion of your choice
• Choose a race track to horse your horse
• Select 1 of the 2 modes
• Keep the horse alive and fed!
• Avoid hurdles by making your horse jump with upward swipe
• Change lanes by swiping right/left
• Avoid collisions with opponent horses
Please don’t forget to rate and share 3D Royal derby horse racing championship. We’d love to hear your suggestions!
